thread.title: Man live streams Melbourne arrest on Facebook | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Man live streams Melbourne arrest on Facebook | Daily Mail Online

author: Peter Devlin For Daily Mail Australia
title: Man live streams Melbourne arrest on Facebook | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share He was later sprayed in the face with capsicum spray by a female officer and arrested. Throughout the scuffle bystanders can be heard calling the officers 'f***ing dogs'. Three officers sustained minor injuries during the incident. 'Capsicum foam was deployed to subdue the driver and another aggressive male,' a police spokesperson said in a statement. The man appears to push one officer before three others tackle him to the ground The situation escalated when the man returned to his car and became aggressive The incident occurred at McDonald's on Millers Rd, Altona North, Melbourne 'Both were provided aftercare before being taken to Altona North Police Station for questioning.' A 22-year-old Altona man was charged with affray and assault police and 19-year-old Altona man was charged with assaulting and resisting police. Both were bailed to appear at Melbourne Magistrates Court on June 20. Police said the incident will be reviewed. He was later sprayed in the face with capsicum spray by a female officer and arrested Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
